material_id.description: Material selector or code used in manufacturing and conversion.

geometry_type.description: Component shape/class used in manufacturing, logic, and compliance.

joinery_profile.description: Type of joint/connection between materials and components.

site_geometry.description: The physical layout or polygon of the site.

budget_range.description: User-defined economic scope for decision-making and matching.

design_priority.description: User preference weightings, typically for style vs cost vs time.

parcel_use_class.description: Legal parcel usage category (e.g., residential, mixed-use).

zoning_code.description: Applicable zoning regulations affecting the component/site.

build_cost_limit.description: Maximum budget for component or project cost.

conversion_effort.description: Complexity or computational effort in geometry conversion.

routing_priority.description: Weight of node routing decisions during logic execution.

logic_depth.description: Evaluation depth for logic-based routing nodes.

investment_expectation.description: Minimum return expectation for investment nodes.

user_affordability_score.description: Derived score of affordability for a given product-user pair.

site_preference_weight.description: Weighting for site-related decisions (location, zoning, etc).

zoning_strictness_score.description: Tolerance level for zoning constraint violations.

regulation_adaptiveness.description: How flexible the system is in interpreting regulatory boundaries.

energy_tolerance.description: Accepted upper limit of energy demand or inefficiency.

mep_priority.description: Weight for matching MEP system compatibility.

bid_preference.description: Preference score influencing which bids are favored.

market_match_threshold.description: Cutoff score for accepting product-market fit.

occupancy_priority.description: Weight of occupancy metrics during evaluation.

usage_variability.description: Expected fluctuation in space or usage patterns.

roi_priority.description: Importance of ROI for final decision-making.

risk_aversion_score.description: Risk tolerance level for investments or allocation.
